source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a night-time aerial view of an airport. The runways and taxiways are illuminated with green and white lights, and the terminal building is also lit up. The surrounding area is dark.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a night-time aerial view of an airport. The runways and taxiways are illuminated with green and white lights, and the terminal building is also lit up. The surrounding area is dark.

generated_critique: The caption accurately describes the visual elements of the static scene. However, it omits a key piece of information required by the instructions: it does not mention that there is no movement in the video. The instructions state to "briefly mention" the lack of movement for static shots. The description of the illuminated airport should be revised to include a statement confirming the absence of any motion.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a night-time aerial view of an airport. The runways and taxiways are illuminated with green and white lights, and the terminal building is also lit up. The surrounding area is dark, and the shot is completely static.
